title: Enhancing Business Strategy Competencies: Clinical Simulation for Respiratory Therapy with a Sociocultural Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and solve patient scenarios through collaboration with peers in a respiratory therapy simulation environment
Learners can apply communication skills to perform treatment procedures in simulations reflecting sociocultural interactions
Learners can record, evaluate simulation results, and propose improvement plans using technology-assisted tools (smartphone apps)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
